de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.stat

Class MalletMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.stat.MalletMethods

  • public class MalletMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Command line importhandler tool for loading a sequence of instances from a single file, with one trainingSet per line of the input file.

    Despite the name of the class, input data does not have to be comma-separated, and trainingSet data can remain sequences (rather than unordered vectors).

    Author:
    Andrew McCallum mccallum@cs.umass.edu
